data.name: IOS多APP
data.template:
{
    "attribute": {
        "productId": "0",
        "name": "IOS多APP"
    },
	"references":[
		{
			"referVarType":"main",
			"expressions": [
			        {
			            "key": "title",
			            "alias": "标题",
			            "validation": {
			                "minLen": 16,
			                "maxLen": 32,
			                "required": true,
			                "illegalChars": ""
			            },
			            "tips":"标题长度16到32个字符",
			            "inputType": "text",
			            "varType": "title",
						"wildcard": "[{\"key\": \"normal\",\"value\": \"{@}\"},{\"key\":\"region\",\"value\":\"{#region#}\"}]",
					"isShowKey":true
			        },
					{
			            "key": "show_url",
			            "alias": "显示网址",
			            "validation": {
			                "minLen": 1,
			                "maxLen": 36,
			                "required": true,
			                "illegalChars": "",
							"type":"domainCheck"
			            },
			            "tips":"请填写显示网址，帐号注册域名或子域名",
			            "inputType": "text",
			            "varType": "url",
						"secondaryVarType":"show",
					"isShowKey":true
			        },
					{
			            "key": "target_url",
			            "alias": "目标网址",
			            "validation": {
			                "minLen": 1,
			                "maxLen": 1024,
			                "required": true,
			                "illegalChars": "",
							"type":"domainCheck"
			            },
			            "tips":"http(s)开头，帐号注册域名或子域名",
			            "inputType": "text",
			            "varType": "url",
						"secondaryVarType": "target",
					"isShowKey":false
			        }
			]
		},
		{
			"referVarType":"ios_app",
			"index":1,
			"expressions":[
				{
					"key": "appname1_h1",
					"alias": "app1名称",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 1,
						"maxLen": 12,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": ""
					},
			        "tips":"长度1到12个字符",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "h1",
					"secondaryVarType": "appname",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "pic1_img",
					"alias": "图片1",
					"validation": {
						"suffixes": [
						"jpg",
						"jpeg",
						"png"
						],
						"maxSize": 100,
						"width": 120,
						"height": 120,
						"required": true
					},
					"tips":"请上传120*120,大小不超过100kb图片,支持jpg和png",
					"inputType": "image",
					"varType": "image",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				
				{
					"key": "1_iosdownload_url",
					"alias": "app1下载地址",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 0,
						"maxLen": 1024,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": "",
						"type":"url"
					},
					"tips":"请填写app下载地址，http(s)开头",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "url",
					"secondaryVarType": "iosdownload",
					"isShowKey":false
				}
			]
		},
		{
			"referVarType":"ios_app",
			"index":2,
			"expressions":[
				{
					"key": "appname2_h1",
					"alias": "app2名称",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 1,
						"maxLen": 12,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": ""
					},
			        "tips":"长度1到12个字符",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "h1",
					"secondaryVarType": "appname",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "pic2_img",
					"alias": "图片2",
					"validation": {
						"suffixes": [
						"jpg",
						"jpeg",
						"png"
						],
						"maxSize": 100,
						"width": 120,
						"height": 120,
						"required": true
					},
					"tips":"请上传120*120,大小不超过100kb图片,支持jpg和png",
					"inputType": "image",
					"varType": "image",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				
				{
					"key": "2_iosdownload_url",
					"alias": "app2下载地址",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 0,
						"maxLen": 1024,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": "",
						"type":"url"
					},
					"tips":"请填写app下载地址，http(s)开头",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "url",
					"secondaryVarType": "iosdownload",
					"isShowKey":false
				}
			]
		},
		{
			"referVarType":"ios_app",
			"index":3,
			"expressions":[
				{
					"key": "appname3_h1",
					"alias": "app3名称",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 1,
						"maxLen": 12,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": ""
					},
					"tips":"长度1到12个字符",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "h1",
					"secondaryVarType": "appname",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "pic3_img",
					"alias": "图片3",
					"validation": {
						"suffixes": [
						"jpg",
						"jpeg",
						"png"
						],
						"maxSize": 100,
						"width": 120,
						"height": 120,
						"required": true
					},
					"tips":"请上传120*120,大小不超过100kb图片,支持jpg和png",
					"inputType": "image",
					"varType": "image",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				
				{
					"key": "3_iosdownload_url",
					"alias": "app3下载地址",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 0,
						"maxLen": 1024,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": "",
						"type":"url"
					},
					"tips":"请填写app下载地址，http(s)开头",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "url",
					"secondaryVarType": "iosdownload",
					"isShowKey":false
				}
			]
		}
	]
}
